insights.title: Pantyliners Demand Explosion
insights.consumer_insight: Pantyliners searches surged from ~250 to 8,453/week - a 32x increase indicating rapid category adoption. This appears to be driven by increased awareness of daily hygiene products and potentially successful brand marketing campaigns. The 91% search-to-cart rate suggests high purchase intent when products are found.
strategy: Prioritize fill rate improvement for top pantyliner SKUs (Whisper, Stayfree)
Expand assortment to include organic/cotton variants for premium segment
Create discovery merchandising for first-time buyers
insights.confidence_reason: Extraordinary growth rate warrants validation; high S2C confirms intent

insights.title: Spray Bottles Category Creation
insights.consumer_insight: Spray bottles searches exploded from ~280 to 12,837/week. This is likely driven by DIY beauty routines (facial mists, setting sprays, hair sprays) and home organization trends. The low 12% S2C rate indicates customers aren't finding what they need - potential assortment gap.
strategy: Audit spray bottle assortment - add cosmetic-grade options (fine mist, travel size)
Cross-merchandise with DIY skincare ingredients
Address 57% availability through fill rate optimization
insights.confidence_reason: High search volume confirmed but low S2C suggests catalog gaps

insights.title: V-Wash Intimate Hygiene Growth
insights.consumer_insight: V-Wash searches at 11,956/week with 228% MoM growth reflects mainstream adoption of intimate hygiene products. The 91% S2C rate is exceptional - customers know what they want and convert when available. This is a brand-led category with high loyalty.
strategy: Ensure 100% availability on V-Wash core SKUs (100ml, 200ml, 350ml)
Expand to V-Wash adjacent products (wipes, plus variants)
Target first-time buyers with smaller trial sizes
insights.confidence_reason: Strong volume, growth, and conversion metrics

insights.title: Premium Shampoo Discovery - L'Oreal Paris Moisture
insights.consumer_insight: L'Oreal Paris moisture-specific searches grew 8x to 4,917/week, indicating premiumization in hair care. The 124% S2C rate (>100% due to basket additions) shows strong category browsing behavior. Customers searching for specific moisture solutions are high-value.
strategy: Create 'Dry Hair Solutions' curated collection featuring L'Oreal, Herbal Essences, Sebamed
Improve fill rate for premium shampoo variants
Cross-sell with conditioners and hair masks
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth but narrower search term

insights.title: Close Up Toothpaste Resurgence
insights.consumer_insight: Close Up searches surged to 12,680/week - a nostalgia-driven or value-seeking behavior as consumers trade down from premium oral care. The 103% S2C rate indicates high conversion, but 58% availability means significant lost sales. Oral Care has the lowest availability among top L2s.
strategy: Address fill rate issues for Close Up core SKUs immediately
Bundle Close Up with mouthwash for basket building
Monitor premium-to-value trade-down across oral care
insights.confidence_reason: High volume and growth; availability is critical bottleneck

insights.title: Sensodyne Sensitivity Care
insights.consumer_insight: Sensodyne repair searches at 15,994/week indicate growing awareness of sensitivity issues. This is a premium, high-margin segment with loyal customers. The 103% S2C shows category browsing - customers often add related products.
strategy: Ensure Sensodyne Repair & Protect, Rapid Relief variants always available
Create 'Sensitivity Care' bundle with sensitivity toothbrush
Target new customers with sample/travel sizes
insights.confidence_reason: Strong premium indicator with high volume

insights.title: Dabur Red Ayurvedic Oral Care
insights.consumer_insight: Dabur Red searches at 15,904/week with 112% growth reflects the ayurvedic/natural personal care trend. Combined with Close Up and Sensodyne, oral care shows multi-segment growth (value, premium, natural). Fill rate issues are category-wide.
strategy: Create 'Ayurvedic Oral Care' collection (Dabur Red, Patanjali, Vicco)
Prioritize fill rate for Dabur Red 150g, 300g family packs
Cross-sell with Dabur mouthwash and tongue cleaners
insights.confidence_reason: Part of broader oral care surge

insights.title: Vicks Lozenges Seasonal Surge
insights.consumer_insight: Vicks lozenges searches exploded to 5,021/week - a 19x increase driven by seasonal cold/flu and throat care needs. The 51% S2C rate is moderate but expected for pharma products where customers compare options.
strategy: Stock up on Vicks variants ahead of remaining winter season
Create 'Cold & Cough' bundles with related OTC products
Address 61% availability through better demand forecasting
insights.confidence_reason: Clear seasonal pattern; plan for next season

insights.title: Paranda Hair Accessories Trend
insights.consumer_insight: Paranda (traditional hair extensions) searches grew 4x to 6,452/week, likely driven by wedding season and traditional fashion trends. The 18% S2C and 14% availability indicate severe supply constraints and assortment gaps.
strategy: Urgently address long-term supply issues (current top OOS reason)
Expand paranda assortment - colors, lengths, materials
Partner with ethnic/traditional accessories brands
insights.confidence_reason: Strong trend but critical availability issue

insights.title: Aroma Magic Facial Kits
insights.consumer_insight: Aroma Magic facial kit searches grew 3x to 3,700/week, reflecting at-home spa/facial trend. The 117% S2C rate shows high conversion and basket building. Planning/ordering issues are causing 64% availability.
strategy: Fix planning/ordering pipeline for Aroma Magic kits
Create 'At-Home Facial' collection with tools and masks
Target with weekend delivery promotions
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth in premium self-care segment

insights.title: Aloe Vera Universal Demand
insights.consumer_insight: Aloe vera searches at 27,897/week (2nd highest volume) with 101% growth. This is a multi-use ingredient (skincare, haircare, sunburn) driving search. The 117% S2C indicates customers add multiple aloe products to cart.
strategy: Create 'Aloe Vera Hub' featuring gels, face washes, hair masks
Stock pure aloe vera gel from multiple brands (Patanjali, WOW, Nature Republic)
Position as summer/sun care essential
insights.confidence_reason: Very high volume with steady growth

insights.title: Livon Hair Serums Premium Segment
insights.consumer_insight: Livon serum searches at 4,965/week with 79% growth and exceptional 241% GMV growth in hair oil/serum category indicates strong premiumization. Customers are willing to pay for salon-quality hair finish products.
strategy: Ensure Livon Serum (50ml, 100ml) consistently available
Expand premium serum range (Moroccan oil, argan serums)
Create 'Salon Finish at Home' bundles
insights.confidence_reason: Strong premium indicator with GMV outpacing search

insights.title: Nooky Chocolate - Sexual Wellness Innovation
insights.consumer_insight: Nooky chocolate searches at 5,430/week indicate demand for discreet, novel sexual wellness products. The 61% S2C shows good conversion. This represents category maturation - customers seeking variety beyond traditional products.
strategy: Expand aphrodisiac/novelty product range
Improve discreet packaging messaging
Address planning/ordering gaps affecting 79% availability
insights.confidence_reason: Emerging niche with strong growth

insights.title: CeraVe Dermatologist-Recommended Skincare
insights.consumer_insight: CeraVe searches at 12,309/week with 226% growth reflects the 'dermatologist recommended' trend driven by social media (TikTok/Instagram). Despite low 48% S2C, customers who find products convert - availability at 74% is leaving demand unmet.
strategy: Prioritize CeraVe core range availability (Moisturizing Cream, Foaming Cleanser, SA Cleanser)
Target with 'Dermatologist Approved' collection
Monitor competitor premium skincare (La Roche-Posay, The Ordinary)
insights.confidence_reason: Strong social-driven demand with clear brand intent

insights.title: Vaseline Moisturiser Traditional Trust
insights.consumer_insight: Vaseline moisturiser searches at 7,987/week with 165% growth shows customers seeking trusted, value moisturization. This contrasts with CeraVe premium trend - indicates segment bifurcation in body lotion.
strategy: Ensure Vaseline range fully stocked (Original, Cocoa Butter, Aloe)
Position as value-for-money body care staple
Bundle with Vaseline lip care for basket building
insights.confidence_reason: Strong brand search with segment validation

insights.title: Mysore Soap Heritage Brand
insights.consumer_insight: Mysore Sandal soap searches at 40,303/week (highest volume signal) with 114% growth indicates strong demand for traditional/heritage products. The 50% S2C is solid for soap category. GMV growing at 9% shows healthy category.
strategy: Ensure Mysore Sandal core variants (regular, gold) always available
Create 'Heritage Personal Care' collection
Address planning/ordering issues affecting 73% availability
insights.confidence_reason: Highest volume signal with consistent growth

insights.title: Garnier Hair Colour Mass Premium
insights.consumer_insight: Garnier colour searches at 8,525/week with 119% growth indicates strong at-home hair coloring trend. The 34% S2C suggests customers comparing shades - need better shade discovery. Fill rate issues at 63% availability hurt conversions.
strategy: Improve shade range completeness for Garnier Color Naturals
Create shade finder/guide for hair colour category
Address fill rate issues for top-selling shades
insights.confidence_reason: Strong volume with clear category opportunity

insights.title: Mehendi Natural Hair Color
insights.consumer_insight: Mehendi searches at 15,280/week with 97% growth (7% zero-result rate) indicates demand for natural hair coloring. Combined with Garnier, hair colour is a dual-opportunity category (chemical + natural). Zero-result rate suggests catalog gaps.
strategy: Expand mehendi brand range (Godrej, VLCC, Khadi)
Address 7% zero-result rate with catalog expansion
Position as 'Natural Hair Color' collection
insights.confidence_reason: High volume with zero-result signal indicating gaps

insights.title: Kiro Clean Beauty Makeup
insights.consumer_insight: Kiro lip makeup searches at 7,277/week with 292% growth signals clean beauty/D2C brand adoption. The 29% S2C is typical for makeup discovery. Lip makeup category at 71% availability with fill rate issues.
strategy: Prioritize Kiro bestsellers (lipsticks, lip crayons) availability
Create 'Clean Beauty' brand collection (Kiro, Sugar, Kay Beauty)
Address fill rate for makeup category broadly
insights.confidence_reason: Strong D2C brand signal with growth

insights.title: Cotton Ear Buds Utility Demand
insights.consumer_insight: Cotton ear bud searches at 3,183/week with 224% growth in makeup tools category. This basic utility product showing surge may indicate customers using Instamart for personal care restocking. The 12% S2C and 57% availability suggest significant unmet demand.
strategy: Stock cotton ear buds from multiple brands at competitive prices
Position in 'Daily Essentials' quick-add collection
Address 57% availability - low-cost, high-frequency item
insights.confidence_reason: Clear demand signal for utility category

key_themes: Feminine Hygiene surge (pantyliners, period products, V-Wash)
Premium Oral Care demand (Close Up, Sensodyne, Dabur Red)
Sexual Wellness normalization (Nooky chocolate, category growth)
Makeup Tools & Accessories (spray bottles, cotton ear buds)
